title: parama yOgi
sahitya:
parama yOgi oruvanaip-paNindEn shuddha paripUraNa guruvAgiya


anupallavi

  nara nArAyaNan varadAyakan nAnirukka bhayamEn ena shonnavan


caraNam    vanda vinaiyai muDikka nalla vazhi kATTiya vaLLal vAi manam 
kaDanda tUya mahimai koNDa perumAn cintai shiva mantiramAi 
jIvalingam tAnAi sheigaiyellAm pUjaiyAgi uyya vaitta deivamAna
